channel.title: Purpose on ProZine
channel.description: Recent content in Purpose on ProZine

item.title: Team Member Indicators
item.description: The other day on the way to work I had an idea. Well two ideas from others and putting them together. Use Rating Without The 7 Use the 1 to 10 rating scale, but you are not allowed to us the number 7.

item.title: Craftsmanship
item.description: I didn’t really give my craft the focus it deserved, until I discovered my purpose. Your purpose tends to evolve with time. my purpose: Make It Easier For Others my craft: Software Solution Development Once I started really applying myself to my craft I noticed that a lot of what I had percievedd problems fell away.
